System.Name: BC-NAND
System.Danger: BC-NAND is required for the Wii U to be able to boot any vWii titles. DO NOT modify it, or your Wii U will no longer be able to load into the vWii without restoring it from Wii U mode.

System.Name: BC-WFS
System.Danger: BC-WFS is required for the Wii U to be able to boot Dragon Quest X Online. While not generally essential, this is a system title and should not be modified.

System.Name: System Menu
System.Danger: The System Menu is a critical part of the vWii's operation, and should not be modified. If it is deleted, it will need to be restored from Wii U mode to be able to access the vWii again.

System Channels.Name: Region Select
System Channels.Danger: "Region Select" is a hidden channel used during the Wii's initial setup. If this title is damaged or missing, you will not be able to set up your Wii again after a factory reset. This title will need to be reinstalled to fix your console.

System Channels.Name: Return to Wii U Menu
System Channels.Danger: "Return to Wii U Menu" is the channel launched from the vWii menu to reboot your console back into Wii U mode. While it generally should not be modified, modifying or removing it will not prevent the vWii from working.
